programme.title: The Great Tours: England, Scotland, and Wales
programme.desc: From thousand-year-old castles to contemporary art museums, look at the scope of all Britain has to offer.

programme.title: The Great Tours: England, Scotland, and Wales
programme.desc: Consider visiting other ancient ruins from prehistoric Britain, such as Avebury or Maiden Castle.

programme.title: The Great Tours: England, Scotland, and Wales
programme.desc: Consider the impact of the Roman conquest in the first century B.C.E. on Great Britain.

programme.title: The Great Tours: England, Scotland, and Wales
programme.desc: With the help of the Venerable Bede and other contemporary sources, explore the Anglo-Saxon conquests.

programme.title: The Great Tours: A Guided Tour of Ancient Egypt
programme.sub-title: Exploring the Gift of the Nile
programme.desc: In this episode, grasp the Nile's integral role in ancient Egyptian culture.

programme.title: The Great Tours: A Guided Tour of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Using objects from Cairo's three great museums, trace 5,000 years of Egyptian history.

programme.title: The Great Tours: A Guided Tour of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Investigate the origins of the Egyptian pyramids and the symbolism of their architecture.

programme.title: The Great Tours: A Guided Tour of Ancient Egypt
programme.sub-title: The Great Pyramid: The Last Ancient Wonder
programme.desc: Take the measure of the Great Pyramid, and marvel at the feat of its construction.

programme.title: The Great Tours: France through the Ages
programme.desc: Contemplate the timeless appeal that makes France the world's most visited tourist destination.

programme.title: The Great Tours: France through the Ages
programme.sub-title: The Birth and Rise of Paris
programme.desc: Mine the layers of history that reveal how Paris evolved from an ancient settlement to the capital of France.

programme.title: The Great Tours: France through the Ages
programme.desc: Discover the remarkable palace of Versailles as the self-contained world of Louis XIV.

programme.title: The Great Tours: France through the Ages
programme.desc: Visit key locations in Paris where the French Revolution of 1789 unfolded.

programme.title: The Great Tours: Ireland and Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Begin with a look at two iconic spots: the Rock of Cashel and the Guinness Brewery.

programme.title: The Great Tours: Ireland and Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Investigate the origins of civilization in Ireland by visiting several ancient sites.

programme.title: The Great Tours: Ireland and Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Visit important sites related to one of the greatest figures in Irish history: St. Patrick.

programme.title: The Great Tours: Ireland and Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Explore the British-Irish divide, which is also a Catholic-Protestant divide.

programme.title: Forensic History: Crimes, Frauds, and Scandals
programme.desc: Start your journey through forensic history with the Jack the Ripper murders.

programme.title: Forensic History: Crimes, Frauds, and Scandals
programme.desc: Study the special forensic category known as lust murder with the 1947 murder-mutilation of the Black Dahlia.

programme.title: Forensic History: Crimes, Frauds, and Scandals
programme.desc: Go to Hollywood and look at how crime scene investigation and autopsy results solve mysteries.

programme.title: Forensic History: Crimes, Frauds, and Scandals
programme.desc: How can cutting-edge research and technology be applied to old cases and result in fresh conclusions?

programme.title: The Agency: A History of the CIA
programme.sub-title: Secrecy, Democracy, and the Birth of the CIA
programme.desc: Examine three key periods of U.S. intelligence before the birth of the CIA.

programme.title: The Agency: A History of the CIA
programme.sub-title: George Kennan and the Rise of Covert Ops
programme.desc: Learn how the CIA transformed from an intelligence agency to housing a premier covert-action unit.

programme.title: The Agency: A History of the CIA
programme.sub-title: The CIA, China, and the Korean War
programme.desc: Discover how the CIA failed to rein in the growing emphasis on covert operations.

programme.title: The Agency: A History of the CIA
programme.desc: Ponder who was most responsible for Mohammad Mosaddeq's fall from power.

programme.title: The Agency: A History of the CIA
programme.desc: Explore the CIA's role in the Guatemalan coup (the operation PB-SUCCESS).
